data.name: Dark Rose Valkyrie: Economic Points Set / お徳用ポイントバラエティパック / 實惠點數禮包
data.detailed_description:
Add a variety of Marks, Medals, and Party Points with the Economic Points Set.

The following will be added:
・[100,000,000] Marks
・[750] Medals
・[1500] PP
・[400,000,000] Marks
・[1500] Medals
・[3000] PP
・[900,000,000] Marks
・[2000] Medals
・[5000] PP

※Uninstalling DLC items may prevent users from loading save files made before the DLC item was uninstalled. To ensure that users can load all Dark Rose Valkyrie save files, we recommend that users do NOT uninstall DLC items.

fullgame.name: Dark Rose Valkyrie / クロバラノワルキューレ / 黑玫瑰女武神

data.supported_languages:
English*, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Mínimo:
  • SO: Windows 7, 64bit
  • Procesador: Intel i5 2.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Memoria: 6 GB de RAM
  • Gráficos: Graphics card with 1GB VRAM or more and compatibility with Direct X 11.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Versión 11
  • Tarjeta de sonido: DirectX 10 compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recomendado:
  • SO: Windows 10 64bit
  • Procesador: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Memoria: 8 GB de RAM
  • Gráficos: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960, ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290, or higher
  • DirectX: Versión 11
  • Tarjeta de sonido: DirectX 10 compatible sound card
